common_issues: Battery draining quickly - check power settings and background apps
Screen flickering - update graphics drivers or check display cable
Keyboard not responding - restart laptop or update keyboard drivers
Overheating - clean fans and check thermal paste
Slow performance - check storage space and close unused applications
WiFi connectivity issues - reset network settings or update drivers
Trackpad not working - check System Preferences trackpad settings
USB ports not recognizing devices - check for debris and restart
Computer won't start - check power connections and PSU
Blue screen errors - run memory test and check for driver conflicts
Slow boot times - disable unnecessary startup programs
Graphics issues - update GPU drivers and check monitor connections
Mouse not connecting - check battery and re-pair Bluetooth
Cursor jumping - clean sensor and check for interference
Buttons not responding - update mouse drivers or check battery
RGB lighting not working - install manufacturer software
Keys not registering - check connection and clean switches
Backlight not working - check software settings and USB power
Some keys typing wrong characters - check language settings
Loud clicking noise - normal for mechanical switches, adjust settings

features: Spreadsheet with pivot tables and charts
common_issues: Installation fails - check system requirements and admin privileges
License activation problems - verify internet connection and license key
Slow performance - close other applications and check available RAM
Files not saving - check disk space and file permissions
Sync issues - verify cloud storage account and internet connection
Crashes during rendering - check GPU drivers and available memory
Import/export errors - verify file format compatibility
Plugins not loading - check plugin directory and permissions
Poor performance - adjust quality settings and close other apps
License server connection failed - check firewall and network settings
High CPU usage - adjust scan settings and schedule
False positive detections - add files to whitelist
VPN connection problems - check server status and try different location
Updates failing - check internet connection and storage space
Firewall blocking applications - configure application permissions

account_management.question: How do I reset my password?
account_management.answer: To reset your password, go to the login page and click 'Forgot Password'. Enter your email address and check for a reset link. The link is valid for 24 hours. If you don't receive the email, check your spam folder or contact support.

account_management.question: How do I change my email address?
account_management.answer: Log into your account, go to Profile Settings, and click 'Change Email'. Enter your new email and verify it by clicking the link sent to the new address. The change takes effect immediately after verification.

account_management.question: How do I enable two-factor authentication?
account_management.answer: In your account Security Settings, click 'Enable 2FA'. Choose between SMS, authenticator app, or hardware key. Follow the setup instructions and save your backup codes in a secure location.

account_management.question: Can I have multiple users on one account?
account_management.answer: Business accounts support multiple users with different permission levels. Personal accounts are for single users only. Contact sales to upgrade to a business account for multi-user access.

billing_and_payments.question: What payment methods do you accept?
billing_and_payments.answer: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express, Discover), PayPal, bank transfers, and cryptocurrency (Bitcoin, Ethereum). Business accounts can also use purchase orders and invoicing.

billing_and_payments.question: How do I update my payment information?
billing_and_payments.answer: Go to Billing Settings in your account, click 'Payment Methods', and add or update your preferred payment method. You can set a primary method and keep backups for failed payments.

billing_and_payments.question: When will I be charged for my subscription?
billing_and_payments.answer: Subscriptions are charged on the same date each billing cycle. Monthly subscriptions charge monthly on your signup date, annual subscriptions charge yearly. You'll receive an email receipt after each payment.

billing_and_payments.question: Can I get a refund if I'm not satisfied?
billing_and_payments.answer: Yes, we offer a 30-day money-back guarantee for most products. Contact support within 30 days of purchase for a full refund. Some restrictions apply to custom software and digital downloads.

technical_support.question: My software won't install. What should I do?
technical_support.answer: First, check system requirements and ensure you have administrator privileges. Temporarily disable antivirus software during installation. If it still fails, download a fresh installer or contact technical support.

technical_support.question: How do I transfer my license to a new computer?
technical_support.answer: Deactivate the license on your old computer through the software's license manager. Install the software on your new computer and activate using the same license key. Contact support if you exceed activation limits.

technical_support.question: The application crashes frequently. How can I fix this?
technical_support.answer: Update to the latest version, check for driver updates, and ensure adequate system resources. Run the application in compatibility mode if on Windows. Send crash logs to support for specific troubleshooting.

technical_support.question: How do I backup my data before updating?
technical_support.answer: Export your data using the built-in backup feature or manually copy files from the application data folder. Store backups in multiple locations including cloud storage. Test restore procedures regularly.

shipping_and_delivery.question: How long does shipping take?
shipping_and_delivery.answer: Standard shipping takes 5-7 business days, express takes 2-3 days, and overnight delivery is next business day by 12 PM. International shipping takes 10-21 business days depending on destination.

shipping_and_delivery.question: Can I track my package?
shipping_and_delivery.answer: Yes, tracking information is emailed within 24 hours of shipment. You can also track packages in your account under 'Order History'. Real-time GPS tracking is available for express shipments.

shipping_and_delivery.question: What if my package is damaged?
shipping_and_delivery.answer: Take photos of the damaged package and contents immediately. Contact support within 48 hours with photos and tracking number. We'll arrange replacement or refund and handle the carrier claim.

shipping_and_delivery.question: Do you ship internationally?
shipping_and_delivery.answer: Yes, we ship to over 150 countries. International shipping costs vary by destination and weight. Customers are responsible for customs duties and taxes. Some restrictions apply for certain products.

Check for interference from other devices (microwaves, baby monitors)
Update network adapter drivers on your computer
Change WiFi channel to avoid congestion (try channels 1, 6, or 11)
Reset network settings on your device
Contact ISP if problems persist across multiple devices
Check cable connections at both ends
Test with a different Ethernet cable
Verify network adapter is enabled in Device Manager
Update Ethernet adapter drivers
Check for damaged ports or cables
Test connection on different device to isolate issue
Run installer as administrator
Temporarily disable antivirus and firewall
Clear Windows Installer cache
Free up disk space (at least 10% of drive capacity)
Install Windows updates and restart
Download fresh installer from official website
Close unnecessary background applications
Increase virtual memory (page file) size
Update application to latest version
Check for malware and run system scan
Clean temporary files and registry entries
Consider hardware upgrade if system requirements not met
Check power cable and outlet functionality
Verify power supply switch is ON
Reseat RAM modules and expansion cards
Clear CMOS battery to reset BIOS settings
Test with minimal hardware configuration
Check for POST beep codes and reference manual
Clean dust from all fans and heat sinks
Check thermal paste on CPU and GPU
Verify all fans are spinning properly
Improve case airflow with additional fans
Monitor temperatures using hardware monitoring software
Reduce ambient room temperature if possible

critical_issues.description: System down, data loss, security breach

high_priority.description: Major functionality impaired, multiple users affected

medium_priority.description: Minor functionality issues, single user affected
